CYYZ.rawOb: CYYZ 101800Z 24012KT 15SM BKN038 M03/M12 A3037 RMK SC7 SLP296
CYYZ.weather_description: Good evening, Toronto! We're feeling the chill tonight as temperatures sit around a cold -3 degrees Celsius. It's a brisk evening with a relative humidity of nearly 50%, which means that cold air might feel a bit more biting than normal. If you're heading out, be prepared for gusty winds, with speeds reaching up to 22.2 kilometers per hour. So bundle up, stay warm, and enjoy your night!

OMDB.weather_description: Good evening! Here’s your weather update for Dubai International. We’re enjoying a pleasant evening with a current temperature sitting at 20 degrees Celsius. The relative humidity is at a comfortable 56.2%, making it feel just right outside. We have a light breeze blowing with winds at 9.3 kilometers per hour, adding to the delightful conditions. Perfect weather to step outside and enjoy the beautiful Dubai skies! Stay tuned for more updates!

LTFM.rawOb: LTFM 101820Z 01014KT 9999 FEW016 BKN024 03/M02 Q1029 NOSIG RMK RWY17L 36013KT RWY34L 35014KT RWY16R 35014KT RWY36 36015KT RWY18 36013KT
LTFM.weather_description: Good evening! Let's take a look at the weather in Istanbul Arpt, Turkey. Currently, we have a chilly temperature of 3 degrees Celsius, so bundle up if you're heading out tonight! The relative humidity is at 69.7%, which means it feels a bit damp in the air. There's a brisk wind blowing from the northeast at around 25.9 kilometers per hour, adding to that brisk feeling. Overall, expect a cool and breezy evening. Don't forget your coat if you plan on being outside! Stay warm and have a great evening!

KLAX.weather_description: Good afternoon, Los Angeles! We're looking at a pleasant day at Los Angeles International Airport, with temperatures currently sitting at a comfortable 15 degrees Celsius. The relative humidity is at 64.2%, giving us that mild, refreshing feel. A gentle breeze is coming in at about 7.4 kilometers per hour, so if you’re out and about, it might feel just a bit cooler. Overall, it’s a lovely day to enjoy some sunshine and fresh air. Don’t forget your sunglasses if you're heading outside! Have a great day!

WIII.rawOb: WIII 101830Z 19003KT 7000 VCTS FEW017CB BKN018 25/23 Q1010 NOSIG RMK CB TO N AND W
WIII.weather_description: Good day, Jakarta! This afternoon, we're looking at a warm temperature of 25 degrees Celsius, but with that warmth comes a touch of humidity, sitting at a high 88.7%. We're definitely feeling the moisture in the air. So grab your umbrella! Thunderstorms are reported in the vicinity, which means we could see some heavy rain and rumbles of thunder as we move through the day. Winds are gentle, blowing in at about 5.6 kilometers per hour, providing little relief from the heat and humidity. It’s a classic tropical scenario here in the capital. Stay tuned for updates and take care if you're out and about during the storms!
